subject: Trades (Sports)
Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal and Amar’e Stoudemire were among the players who stayed put when a whirlwind of trade rumors gave way to a harmless winter breeze.
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal and Amar’e Stoudemire were among the players who stayed put when a whirlwind of trade rumors gave way to a harmless winter breeze.
